creator: Simon.Woo@customs.treas.gov
text:
The ANT utility does not work in this build because the lcp.bat file is missing 
in <TOMCAT_HOME>\bin.  Copying that batch file from the jakarta-ant-1_3-bin.zip 
resolves the problem.

creator: marc.saegesser@apropos.com
text:
The path to lcp.bat is specified as %ANT_HOME%\bin\lcp.bat in ant.bat.  Define 
the ANT_HOME environment variable and you won't need to copy the file into 
TOMCAT_HOME\bin.
